org.grouplens.lenskit.scored

Class ScoredIds

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.scored.ScoredIds

  • public final class ScoredIds
extends Object

    Utility classes for working with scored IDs.

    Since:
    1.1
    Compatibility
    Public

        Returns:

      • idFunction

        public static Function<ScoredId,Long> idFunction()

        A Function that extracts the ID from a scored ID.

        Returns:

      • idOrder

        public static Ordering<ScoredId> idOrder()

        An ordering (comparator) that compares IDs by score.

        Returns:
        An ordering over ScoredIds by score.

        An ordering (comparator) that compares IDs by score.

        Returns:

      • channelOrder

        public static Ordering<ScoredId> channelOrder(Symbol chan)

        An ordering (comparator) that compares IDs by channel. Missing channels are less than present channels.

        Parameters:
        chan - The channel to sort by.
        Returns:
        An ordering over scored IDs by channel.

      • channelOrder

        public static <T extends Comparable<? super T>> Ordering<ScoredId> channelOrder(TypedSymbol<T> chan)

        An ordering (comparator) that compares IDs by typed channel. Null values are sorted first. This method calls channelOrder(TypedSymbol, Comparator) with a comparator of Ordering.natural().nullsFirst().

        Parameters:
        chan - The channel to sort by.
        Returns:
        A comparator over scored IDs.
        See Also:
        channelOrder(TypedSymbol, Comparator)

      • channelOrder

        public static <T> Ordering<ScoredId> channelOrder(TypedSymbol<T> chan,
                                  Comparator<? super T> order)

        An ordering (comparator) that compares IDs by typed channel. Missing channels and null Ids are both treated as having null channel values, so their ordering is controlled by the order’s null treatment.

        Parameters:
        chan - The channel to sort by.
        order - The ordering to use.
        Returns:
        A comparator over scored IDs.

      • collectionFromVector

        public static Collection<ScoredId> collectionFromVector(SparseVector vector)

        View a vector as a collection of ScoredId objects.

        Parameters:
        vector - The vector to view as a collection of ScoredIds
        Returns:
        A fast collection containing this vector’s keys and values as ScoredId objects.
